scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9; lsof -ti:3002 | xargs kill -9; lsof -ti:3003 | xargs kill -9
scripts.demo:one: cd manual; yarn && cd Website1; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:one:prod: cd manual/Website1; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:prod
scripts.demo:two: cd manual/Website2; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:two:prod: cd manual/Website2; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:prod
scripts.demo:two:debug: cd manual/Website2; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:debug
scripts.demo:three: cd manual/Website3; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:three:debug: cd manual/Website3; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:debug
scripts.demo:three:prod: cd manual/Website3; yarn && yarn link "webpack-external-import" && yarn manual:prod
scripts.demo: yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && concurrently "yarn compile" "yarn link" "yarn demo:one"  "yarn demo:two"  "yarn demo:three"
scripts.demo:debug: yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && concurrently "yarn kill-ports" "yarn compile" "yarn link" "yarn demo:one" "yarn demo:two" "yarn demo:three:debug"
scripts.demo:prod: yarn && yarn compile && yarn link && yarn demo:one:prod | yarn demo:two:prod
scripts.demo:fast: yarn compile && yarn link && yarn demo:one:fast | yarn demo:two:fast
scripts.babel: yarn compile && cd manual && yarn babel
scripts.prepare: BABEL_ENV=production yarn compile && cd manual && yarn
